data.title: Amazon Fire 7 Review: All Kinds of Cheap

data.title: Amazon adds color adjustable lighting to its best Kindle
data.text: For e-reader devotees, it doesn’t get better than the Kindle Oasis. Amazon’s the last giant player standing in the category (unless you consider what Barnes & Noble is doing “standing”), and the Oasis is ounce for ounce the best Kindle device it has produced.

data.title: New Kindle Oasis e-reader with color-adjustable light coming July 24 for $250
data.text: Amazon's high-end e-reader is getting a slight refresh ahead of the summer with a light that goes from cool to warm.

data.title: Amazon's latest Kindle Oasis lets you adjust the screen color for easier reading at night
data.text: Amazon announced an all-new Kindle Oasis on Wednesday morning with a feature that lets you adjust the screen to warmer tones for easier reading at night.

data.title: Amazon refreshes $250 high-end Kindle Oasis with adjustable reading light
data.text: Amazon will ship a new version of its high-end Kindle Oasis next month, the latest in a series of refreshes for the company’s line of e-readers.

data.title: Amazon Just Made a Big Move to Take on Roku and Hulu
data.text: The company is revamping its ad-supported streaming service in advance of expansion in Europe.

data.title: Amazon Extends Plans to Crush FedEx
data.text: FedEx killed part of its deal to deliver goods for Amazon last week.
